examples: His sudden departure threw the office into chaos.
Su repentina partida sumió en el caos a la oficina.
rumores de su inminente / inminente partida
They had received no news of him since his departure from the island.
No habían recibido noticias de él desde su salida de la isla.
The day of their departure for London was growing closer.
Se acercaba el día de su partida a Londres.
